Address.label: Address
Address.value: 10 GLENLAKE PARKWAY,SOUTH TOWER, SUITE 600, ATLANTA, Georgia, 30328, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Americold Realty Trust Inc is the largest global owner and operator of temperature-controlled warehouses in the United States. The Atlanta, Georgia, based firm derives about 85% of its revenue from the U.S. but has sizable operations in Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. Americold supplements its core business by providing supply management and transportation services to its various customers. It operates as a real estate investment trust.
